DOC.brief_title: A Phase I/II Study Evaluate Single Agent Combination Therapy With Megestrol Acetate Dronabinol Treatment HIV-Wasting Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: HIV-wasting syndrome , characterize severely debilitate anorexia weight loss , particular concern exacerbate primary illness associate poor prognosis . Attempts maintain body mass use megestrol acetate dronabinol , two anti-cachectic drug , may prolong survival . Fifty-six patient randomize one four treatment arm , follow : high-dose megestrol acetate alone ; dronabinol alone ; high-dose megestrol acetate combine dronabinol ; low-dose megestrol acetate combine dronabinol . Treatment continue 12 week . Patients evaluated toxicity , preliminary evidence response ( e.g. , weight gain ) , steady-state pharmacokinetics drug therapy .
